title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 31 - Gas, Electric, Steam, Waterworks, Telegraph And Telephone Corporations
content:

State Regulations
§ 31.1 - Contents of petition
§ 31.2 - Evidence to be presented at hearing
§ 31.3 - Radio-telephone utilities, resellers of telephone services

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 31

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§70, 83, 89-h, 99

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
